title: Platinum 3v3 Team looking for members!
body:
Hey guys,

We are looking for an apc for our 3v3 team. We are at the moment platinum 3 with 75 LP( decreased due to inactivity). We won alot, but now we need a new player. 

I am the support, gold 2 and was already this season diamond in 3v3. The adc is diamond 5, so be between Platinum and Diamond, as best with some experiences.

We are german speaking, but it's also fine if you are english or you have another mother tongue!

see ya!

btw: would start tomorrow with team!
